experience.jobdesc: Maintain Company Website. Manage company email account. Manage Company hardware / software
Create front end website using Laravel Maintain and upgrade company official website
Respond to customer technical issues and proffer solution.Attend to customer requests and ensure optimum satisfaction
Escalate unresolved technical issues to my team for proper action. Monitor and ensure stability with customer’s link.
Attend to customer’s request (Hardware repairs, Training, Maintenance etc.) Ensure customer’s goods are safe and/or delivered promptly
